def test_home_friendship_edit_sign(self):
        try:
            # 初始化我的主页个人说明书状态为休闲
            self.test_home_friendship_status_change()

            # 编辑个性签名
            edit_element = self.page.get_element(selector="", xpath="//image[contains(@src, 'edit-icon.png')]",
                                                 max_timeout=max_timeout)
            edit_element.click()

            # 等待编辑弹窗出现
            self.page.element_is_exists(
                selector=".fu-textarea textarea",
                max_timeout=max_timeout
            )
            self.logger.info(f"已弹出个性签名弹窗")
            self.capture(f"已弹出个性签名弹窗_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}")

            # 输入内容
            input_element = self.page.get_element(selector=".fu-textarea textarea", max_timeout=max_timeout)
            # 清空弹窗内容
            input_element.input("")

            self.logger.info(f"弹窗个性签名内容已清空")
            self.capture(f"弹窗个性签名内容已清空_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}")

            # 随机生成1-300字内容
            self.logger.info("生成随机文本内容...")
            random_sign = random_text_generator.generate_random_text(
                min_len=1,
                max_len=300,
                chinese_ratio=0.8  # 80%中文+20%英文
            )
            self.logger.info(f"生成随机文本（长度：{len(random_sign)} 字）：{random_sign}")

            input_element.input(random_sign)
            time.sleep(0.5)

            if input_element.value == "":
                input_element.input(random_sign)

                # 验证个性签名输入内容是否正确
                inputted_text = input_element.attribute("value")
                assert inputted_text == [random_sign], f"输入内容不一致：预期{[random_sign]}，实际{inputted_text}"
                self.logger.info(f"输入个性签名成功：{inputted_text} ")

            self.logger.info(f"输入个性签名成功：{input_element.value} ")
            self.capture(f"输入个性签名成功_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}")

            # AI 润色
            ai_editing_btn_list = self.page.get_elements(myhome_ai_editing_element, max_timeout=max_timeout)
            ai_editing_btn_one = ai_editing_btn_list[0]

            self.logger.info(f"ai_reset_src:{ai_editing_btn_one.attribute("src")[0]}")
            # 点击 AI 润色
            if ai_editing_btn_one.attribute("src")[0] == myhome_ai_editing_start_src:
                ai_editing_btn_one.tap()
                time.sleep(1)
                start_time = time.strftime("%H%M%S")

                self.logger.info(f"点击AI润色")
                self.capture(f"点击AI润色_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}")

                while True:
                    end_btn = self.page.element_is_exists(myhome_ai_editing_loading_src, max_timeout=max_timeout)
                    self.logger.info(f"end_btn：{end_btn} ")
                    if not end_btn:
                        end_time = time.strftime("%H%M%S")
                        break

                total_time = int(end_time) - int(start_time) - 1
                self.logger.info(f"AI 润色消耗的时间为：{total_time} 秒")

                # 获取润色后的内容
                ai_input_element = self.page.get_element(selector=".fu-textarea textarea", max_timeout=max_timeout)
                ai_inputted_text = ai_input_element.attribute("value")[0]
                self.logger.info(f"ai_inputted_text:{ai_inputted_text}")
                time.sleep(3)

                # AI 润色 继续生成
                ai_editing_btn_list = self.page.get_elements(myhome_ai_editing_element, max_timeout=max_timeout)
                ai_editing_btn_one = ai_editing_btn_list[0]

                self.logger.info(f"ai_reset_src:{ai_editing_btn_one.attribute("src")[0]}")
                # 点击 AI 润色
                if ai_editing_btn_one.attribute("src")[0] == myhome_ai_editing_reset_src:
                    ai_editing_btn_one.tap()
                    time.sleep(1)
                    start_time = time.strftime("%H%M%S")

                    self.logger.info(f"点击AI润色继续生成")
                    self.capture(f"点击AI润色继续生成_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}")

                    while True:
                        end_btn = self.page.element_is_exists(myhome_ai_editing_loading_src, max_timeout=max_timeout)
                        if not end_btn:
                            end_time = time.strftime("%H%M%S")
                            break

                    total_time = int(end_time) - int(start_time) - 1
                    self.logger.info(f"AI 润色继续生成消耗的时间为：{total_time} 秒")

                    # 获取润色后的内容
                    ai_input_element = self.page.get_element(selector=".fu-textarea textarea", max_timeout=max_timeout)
                    ai_inputted_text = ai_input_element.attribute("value")[0]
                    self.logger.info(f"ai_inputted_text:{ai_inputted_text}")
                    time.sleep(1)


                    # 点击保存
                    home_save_header = self.page.get_element(home_create_other_manual_home_address_save_element,
                                                             max_timeout=max_timeout)
                    home_save_text_list = home_save_header.get_elements(home_create_other_manual_home_address_save_tag,
                                                                        max_timeout=max_timeout)
                    for home_save in home_save_text_list:
                        if home_save.text == home_save.text:
                            home_save.tap()

                            self.logger.info(f"编辑个性签名点击{home_save.text} ")
                            self.capture(f"编辑个性签名点击{home_save.text}_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}")


                    # 等待保存成功：验证新签名已显示
                    self.page.element_is_exists(
                        selector="text",
                        text_contains=ai_inputted_text,
                        max_timeout=max_timeout
                    )

        except Exception as e:
            self.logger.error(f"编辑个性签名失败：{str(e)}")
            # 异常时截图
            self.capture(f"编辑个性签名失败_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}")
            time.sleep(1)
            raise
